InclusionRules.name: Exclude noncompliance to treatment
InclusionRules.description: Exclude patients with recorded noncompliance with treatment during the time period for entry event.

InclusionRules.name: Exclude APs prior
InclusionRules.description: Exclude antipsychotic exposure prior to entry event

InclusionRules.name: Exclude SCs non-excludable otherwise
InclusionRules.description: Exclude ICD10CM codes for dementia mapped to psychotic disorder

InclusionRules.name: 1 IP or 2 OP visits
InclusionRules.description: 1 IP or 2 OP visits with psychosis within 30 days, 30 days prior to drug exposure

InclusionRules.name: Exclude prior psychoses
InclusionRules.description: No psychoses prior to the inclusion visit

InclusionRules.name: No other APs on the first day
InclusionRules.description: Exclude patients taking other APs on day 1

InclusionRules.name: No other APs covering day 0
InclusionRules.description: Excluding multiple drugs with long exposures

InclusionRules.name: No organic psychotic conditions during the diagnosis period
InclusionRules.description: Additional exclusion of organic and drug-induced psychoses
